# level

**Instance Property**

Returns the nesting level of the receiver within the tree hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
var level: Int { get }
```

## Return Value

An integer indicating a nesting level.

## Discussion

The root element of a document has a nesting level of one.

## Managing XML Node Objects

- **index**: Returns the index of the receiver identifying its position relative to its sibling nodes.
- **kind**: Returns the kind of node the receiver is as a constant of type [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Kind-swift.enum].
- **name**: Returns the name of the receiver.
- **objectValue**: Returns the object value of the receiver.
- **stringValue**: Returns the content of the receiver as a string value.
- **setStringValue(_:resolvingEntities:)**: Sets the content of the receiver as a string value and, optionally, resolves character references, predefined entities, and user-defined entities as declared in the associated DTD.
- **uri**: Returns the URI associated with the receiver.
